participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Driven and ambitious, Emily is a high-achiever with a passion for sports and helping others.
participant_1.background: my current goal is to run a k. i make straight as in school. i won homecoming queen this year. i'm currently in high school. when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and thrill-seeking, Jake enjoys racing and the freedom that comes with riding his motorbike.
participant_2.background: i wear a motorbike helmet to protect my head. i've light skin with big brown eyes. its red with blue stripe so it shiny when i race. my main transportation is my motorbike.

content.text: hi! i just got back from my run!
